        protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)
        Instantiate the view and nfc scan components
        Parameters:

      • onNewIntent

        public void onNewIntent(Intent intent)
        When we receive an intent from the nfc adapter try to read the nfc tag and send the uid back to the caller
        Parameters:
        intent - intent from the nfc adapter

      • onResume

        public void onResume()
        When running in the foreground enable this activity's nfc adapter to receive intents for a given set of intent-filters. Tag discovered intent-filter in our case.

      • onPause

        public void onPause()
        When in paused mode disable receiving nfc intents

      • onCancelScan

        public void onCancelScan()
        Onclick on the cancel button close the activity with result_canceled
